Question.Subject: unblock websites from internet options?
Question.Content: if any one has at&t internet how do you unblock websites from internet options tell me what to go to in internet potions to unblock websites
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Here's what to do: go to Tools > Internet Options, click the Security tab, click Restricted Sites, click Sites button, find the site to unblock & click it once to highlight it then click Remove, when finished click Close, click OK. Done!
...

Answer.Content:
Here's what to do: go to Tools > Internet Options, click the Security tab, click Restricted Sites, click Sites button, find the site to unblock & click it once to highlight it then click Remove, when finished click Close, click OK. Done!
